comment: Easiest A ever. Do the online (busy)work ON TIME, read the study guides (pretty much the test) and show up. Grade drops after 3 absences (department policy).

Nice guy, ridiculously easy class, but a waste of time. Prof. Morgan just rambles about whatever so it's pretty boring, but he's nice and an easy grader so I didn't mind. I recommend taking this course online. You need the online textbook. He would only occasionally take attendance. Two in class grades- midterm&final which he gave study guides for.

this is a rare class where you talk about life a lot, but the teacher himself was great. the class as a whole should be an easy A. mostly everything is done online, but you do need to come to class lectures.

Easiest class ever. 2 exams in class are the study guide, and online HW is beyond easy. Attendance is hit or miss, but you get an F for more than 6 absences. He's a cool, funny guy and has lots of interesting stories and facts. This class is useless though, just KSU raking in more cash by making it a requirement. Definitely take online.

Seriously the best professor I've ever had. His tests are so easy because his study guides are basically the test. He cares more about you actually learning something than grades. Super cool guy and very approachable and understanding. He always keeps the class interesting. He takes attendance randomly but its a class you'll always want to go to.

One of the coolest professors out there.  Take his class.  As long as you show up and listen to his discussions, you're good.  His tests are easy because he reviews what is going to be on them. Again, show up, do the online work, (which isn't hard) and you'll pass with flying colors.

honestly a great teacher. I got a 98% in his class for showing up and turning in the assignments on time. You shouldn't have any issues in his class. I signed up for his latest class because it was the only one open, and I had a 3 hour gap between his class and my one before it. I talked to him about it and he let me show up to his earlier class
Really no grades other than two simple tests and a few online assignments. All you do is just listen to him talk every class and he's a cool guy.

TAKE THIS CLASS. I had Morgan for  Wellness and it was the easiest A to offset my difficult semester. Attendance varies in importance- he will occasionally give assignments in class, but they are a small % of the grade. Everything is online. I stopped attending the last 2 months and only completed online assignments. Still made an A.

Om my gosh, this guy is the EASIEST professor I have ever had! All of the work is online, but he randomly will give "flex points" if you come to lecture that will count towards your grade (ie "flex points" are a part of the total points for the class). His lectures are hilarious, and he is such a lovable guy. Online work is a bit tedious, but EASY.

TAKE HIM.  Went to like only 3 of the classes.  Every assignment is online these days and takes like 30 min max to complete every 2 or 3 weeks. Just make sure to follow the directions online or you might get some points off.  He's also a super cool guy if you feel like going to class.

One of the best teachers at Kennesaw State. Makes it as easy as possible for students and is ready to help. Lectures are clear and if you do not pass the class with a 100% then i dont know what to tell you! Take him! Also, go to classes just in case because he may give in class activities that are worth lots of points. You will Pass!

TAKE THIS CLASS!!!! Easy GPA booster, no test/ quizzes, book is not necessary. i literally copied an pasted the same thing for homework each week. you don't even have to go to class because he only takes roll for like the first month.  He offers extra credit if you run a 5k or have a cholesterol check in the clinic. finally TAKE THIS CLASS!!!
Super chill and funny! The class is super easy, I would definitely take him again.

Definitely take Prof. Morgan! He is so chill and just wants you to try - super easy A!! Lectures are sometimes boring since it is straight from the book and he often rambles about sports with the guys, but there is a take-home quiz every week (open-book),a couple physical activities, two "projects," and take-home (open-book) final. 1 extra credit

easiest A you can ever get!! Took this course during Summer Semester; we had to print and fill out the "tests" at home and hand them in the next class, Tests=40 MC and 10 T/F; Final= 100 MC (also print and fill out at home), laid back teacher, best course for Summer Semester

Mr. Morgan doesn't really know what he's talking about at all.. He doesn't even know how to pronounce half the words on his own powerpoints. His classes are boring and his tests are a LOT harder than they should be for this class.. He does drop one of the tests though so if you get Bs on his tests and do all the labs, you can get an A w/o the final
